name: VR Angry Cow Farm Simulator
description:
** All those who loves Craze Bull and Crazy Cows be ready to face the rampage challenge **
VR My Angry Cow Simulator 3D is game of a crazy & angry cow that is ready to smash & attack anything come across as its running cow who wants to escape from town. It’s really a furious cow & getting scared from people so creating a lot of chaos and destruction to run for her life. You have to help her in triumph to save her life by helping her to save from butcher encounter.

This cow is acting like a wild bull and willing to destruct everything coming to its way with full aggression and speed as its running for life in a modern town, so help to save cow life and to escape from ultimate destruction in your town caused by cow.

VR My Angry Cow Simulator 3D is cow simulation game & cow running game, it’s one of the top free game with multiple action and packed missions with thrill else it’s going to ruin everything in town.

Experience life of the wild cow that have entered in the town to create ultimate destruction by a cattle. It’s one of the best crazy game which you will love to play.

Angry cow is going to quell all of its aggression and anger while displaying its power in a run game. You just have to hold your breath and take control of your mad cow that’s going to smash objects in her way, you have to let her escape from butcher else your mad cow will be slaughtered and you will be fail to save your crazy cow that is going act like to bullfighter.

You would have played animal games, crazy games, games for cats, animal games, horse games, dog’s games, animal simulator games, cattle farm games etc., but My Angry Cow Simulator is unique Run Simulation & having different concept.

Download this terrific 3D animal simulator in your smart phone from App store and ENJOY.

My Angry Cow Simulator features include:

** Realistic cow animations.
** Thrilling challenge & cool game play.
** Stunning action pack game play.
** Amazing realistic sound effect.
** Amazing 3D Simulation.
